    • About Troy Davis


    Troy Davis is a native to Butte County, CA, where he has resided for over 45 years and continues to do so with his wife and loving family. Troy started his real estate career with Coldwell Banker Ponderosa in July 2003 as a sales person. Then in 2006, Troy furthered his education, studied extensively and obtained his real estate Broker’s license. Troy believes that continuing his real estate education and training are crucial to providing a superior service, maximizing profits and minimizing costs when buying or selling a home.
